colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(CES MKHA' 'GRO CHEN MO TSE RING MCHED LNGA'I GSOL MCHOD CHOS SRID BDE DGA' RAB RGYAS ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, HAL HA KHU RE CHEN MO'I BKRA SHIS THOS BSAM GLING KHAM TSAN NAS, DAD LDAN DGE SLONG GRAGS PA BLO BZANG GIS BSKUL BA MA ZAD, CANG JUN TSE TSEN HAN NAS KYANG BKA' STZAL PHEBS PA BCAS, THE BO MKHAN SPRUL YE SHES THUB BSTAN RGYA MTSOS YONGS 'DZIN GYI LO RGYAL ZLA BA'I DMAR PHYOGS KYI DUS KHU RE CHEN MOR SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI NYE DRUNG YE SHES BSHAD SGRUB PO, ,SARBA DZA GA TAm,, ,,)
